Sprints (100m, 200m, 400m).nutritionistTip: Protein timing is crucial for sprinters. Consume a protein-rich snack or meal within an hour after your training session to maximize muscle repair.

Marathon & Road Races.nutritionistTip: Carbohydrates are your primary fuel source. Focus on complex carbs throughout the day to keep your glycogen stores full for long runs.
